title: Update Benefits card label and justify benefit descriptions

requirements.text: In the Benefits section, change the benefit card title text from "Responsible Materials" to "Sustainable" (only within the selected element at /html/body/div/div/main/section[4]/div[1]).
acceptanceCriteria: The benefits card that previously displayed the title "Responsible Materials" now displays "Sustainable".
No other section titles or copy elsewhere on the page are changed.

requirements.text: Update the Benefits card subtext (the benefit description paragraphs) to use justified alignment instead of center alignment (only within the selected element at /html/body/div/div/main/section[4]/div[1]).

quotes: Make the subtext alignment justified, right now it is center aligned.

acceptanceCriteria: Benefit description text is rendered with CSS text alignment set to justify on mobile and desktop.
Icons and titles remain visually centered as they are now; only the description/subtext alignment changes.
No other paragraph text in other sections is affected.

constraints: Apply changes only to the selected element (/html/body/div/div/main/section[4]/div[1]) in the Benefits section.
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any frontend immutablePaths.
nonGoals: No changes to backend logic (Motoko actor remains unchanged).
No layout/spacing redesign beyond the requested text changes and subtext alignment update.
